name: Heavy Works (itch)
description:
Physics based construction, excavation and general heavy equipment. With story and money.

Game is currenty in eary Alpha under heavy development.

---------[Features]----------

Basic jobs for filling and excavating various gound types.

2 Diggers,1 Truck,1 Pickup truck,3 Trailers,1 Front Loader (many more to be added)

Simple Swapable digger buckets(early prototype)

Works with Gamepad + keyboard/mouse

----------[Things to improve]----------

Everything (this is very early development)

I try hard to keep each version playable and (gamebreaking)bug free

----------[Features To be Added]----------

Vehicle maintenance (vehicle performance based on condition)

Attachment for vehicles (digger buckets & drills, arms for trucks ect)

More job types including demolition,underground pipes, moving other objects like continers/pipes ect.

Vehicle shop (coming very soon with more vehicles)

vehicles to be added will include

more of what we have - Cranes - Roadsweepers - TruckCab+trailer - Graders -Wrecker equipment

Join Discord to see more and chat https://discord.gg/76HgBPy
